thread.title: BREAKING: Sweden supermarket evacuated after 'hand grenade' found inside police HQ bin
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Sweden supermarket evacuated after 'hand grenade' found inside police HQ bin

title: BREAKING: Sweden supermarket evacuated after 'hand grenade' found inside police HQ bin
text:
BREAKING: Sweden supermarket evacuated after 'hand grenade' found inside police HQ bin BREAKING: Sweden supermarket evacuated after 'hand grenade' found inside police HQ bin A SUSPECTED hand grenade has been found in Europe’s Silicon Valley near a Swedish shopping centre. PUBLISHED: 09:45, Mon, Feb 27, 2017 | UPDATED: 09:53, Mon, Feb 27, 2017 Stefan Johannson The bomb was found in a bin outside the Kista police headquarters 
The bomb squad moved in to remove the dangerous object found in a rubbish bin at about 10.30am near the police headquarters in Kista, a district in Stockholm which is the world’s second largest ICT cluster after California’s Silicon Valley. 
Police cordoned off the area and evacuated a supermarket in the nearby shopping mall, police said. 
Bomb experts have started testing the suspected hazardous object, local newspaper SVT said. 
Town Hägg, a spokesman for Stockholm Police, said: “The dangerous object was found in Kista Square where the police station is. 
“We received an alarm from SOS alarms. 
“Now, we will examine the object.” 
This is breaking news.
